item.title: 004. Seoul, South Korea

Seoul, South Korea #

Seoul is the capital city of South Korea, a fascinating country in East Asia ðŸŒ. This vibrant city is full of interesting sights ðŸŒŸ, delicious food ðŸ², and amazing people!

Where Is Seoul? ðŸ“ #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea ðŸ—ºï¸. It sits along the Han River ðŸžï¸, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.

item.title: 009. Singapore
item.description:
Singapore, Singapore #

  • City: æ–°åŠ å¡ (san1 gaa3 bo1)
  • Country: ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¬ æ–°åŠ å¡ (san1 gaa3 bo1)

Singapore is a small island city-state located in Southeast Asia, right at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Even though it’s one of the 20 smallest countries in the world, Singapore is packed with amazing things to see and do! ðŸŒâœ¨

Where Is It? ðŸ“ #

Singapore sits just 85 miles north of the Equator and consists of one main diamond-shaped island plus about 60 tiny islets. It’s separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to the north and from Indonesia by the Singapore Strait to the south. ðŸŒŠðŸ—ºï¸

item.title: 011. Osaka
item.description:
Osaka, Japan #

  • City: å¤§é˜ª (daai6 baan2)
  • Country: ðŸ‡¯ðŸ‡µ æ—¥æœ¬ (jat6 bun2)

Osaka, a bustling city in Japan ðŸ‡¯ðŸ‡µ, is full of history ðŸ“œ, culture ðŸŽŽ, and excitement ðŸŽ‰. Located in the Kansai region on the island of Honshu, Osaka is the third-largest city in Japan, with a population of approximately 2.7 million people. Known for its friendly locals ðŸ˜„, delicious food ðŸœ, and vibrant entertainment districts ðŸŽ­, Osaka is often referred to as “Japan’s Kitchen” due to its rich culinary tradition. This article will introduce you to Osaka’s location ðŸŒ, one special sightseeing spot ðŸžï¸, its language ðŸ—£ï¸ and food ðŸ½ï¸, a famous musician ðŸŽµ and scientist ðŸ”¬ from the city, and a fun fact about this fascinating place.
